title: Slingers (Marvel) [BBN][h33t]
description:
[IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/8982/slingers01dusk00fcuh5du2.jpg[/IMG]
Slingers 0-12 (Marvel) (Spider-Man Titles)

[quote]The team&#039;s four members used costumes and codenames that had been used by Spider-Man during the "Identity Crisis" crossover. During "Identity Crisis", Spider-Man was wanted for murder with a million-dollar reward posted for his capture; instead of his normal costumed identity, he adopted four other costumes and created a different crimefighting persona for each suit. After this crisis had ended, he discarded the four costumes, and they subsequently disappeared, reappearing in the possession of the Golden Age superhero called the Black Marvel. The Marvel gave the costumes to four youths, and trained them to become heroes.[/quote]

[IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/7743/slingers1200fczg0ks4.jpg[/IMG]


]BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.
